channel.title: William Shakespeare on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in William Shakespeare on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Max Martin’s Musical ‘& Juliet’ Debuts in L.A. as Taylor Swift Album Excitement Builds
item.description: “We were able to learn so much from him,” Rachel Webb, who stars in the touring production of the hit Broadway musical, tells The Hollywood Reporter of working with the prolific producer.
